Inside the chunk: Label has to be in the chunk options. Captions has to be within the kable command.

```{r}
#| label: tbl-firstsix
#| echo: false

library(knitr)
# library(kableExtra)
library(tibble)

MyData <- tibble(x = 1:3, y = 1:3)

kable(MyData, caption = "Observations from the Dataset")
```

See @tbl-firstsix

```{r}
#| label: tbl-cars
#| tbl-cap: "Cars"
#| tbl-colwidths: [10,10]

kable(head(cars))
```


To reference correctly in LaTex:

$$
C^2=a^2+b^2 \label{eq-einstein}
$$ 
Pythagoras in Equation \eqref{eq-einstein} in LaTex. This will not work in html.

To reference correctly in HTML and LaTex (but no () around equation):

$$
C^2=a^2+b^2 
$$ {#eq-einstein2}

Pythagoras in  @eq-einstein2.
